sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts"><x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Story</name><number>SCRIPT0001055</number><script><![CDATA[// On your ServiceNow Personal Developer Instance, create an OTP generating application with fields 
// username(string), email address(string), DOB (date), OTP (numeric must accept only 6char numbers).
// Below are the acceptance criteria:
// 1. Email field must be validated to see if proper email is entered.
// 2. 2 UI Action must be present with name 'Generate OTP', 'Validate OTP', 
// 3. On click of 'Generate OTP' it must generate a random 6-digit number to the email entered above.
// 4. On click of 'Validate OTP' it must validate the OTP sent on email to check if it matches or not.
// 5. On OTP match - show a message 'OTP verified successfully'.
// 6. On OTP mismatch - show a message 'invalid OTP entered, please re-generate OTP'.
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-11 07:47:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>d087a4e3072739105295f19d7c1ed006</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Story</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Technical Repo" source="x_207260_technic_0">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Repo">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_d087a4e3072739105295f19d7c1ed006</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-11 07:47:38</sys_updated_on></x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts></record_update>
